title: Daughter of Darkness
tags: journey to the house of grief
find a way into the cloister
content: Kill Raphael’s Old Enemy active, along with its corresponding part of the Companion Quest The Pale Elf. When you go through the iron fence, you’ll hear a talking skull telling you to beat it, but it won’t do anything else if you interact with it. A part of Ketheric Thorm’s diary sits near his diseased wife’s coffin. Other parts as scattered around this area if you want to look into his past. In the eastern area of this first area, you can find a locked Traveller’s Chest at (X:-259, Y:-882). It
